body:
When `setuptools` dependency is commented out package compiles just fine. When enabled we get the following errors. Hence disabling this dependency.
```
==> Installing py-configobj
==> Searching for binary cache of py-configobj
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for py-configobj found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /mnt/local/spackdev/var/spack/cache/py-configobj/py-configobj-5.0.6.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /cache/spack-stage/sbulut/py-configobj-5.0.6-nlskpzrlxyv2doxvzmxdwn2ixp35yn7j/configobj-5.0.6.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /cache/spack-stage/sbulut/py-configobj-5.0.6-nlskpzrlxyv2doxvzmxdwn2ixp35yn7j
==> No patches needed for py-configobj
==> Building py-configobj [PythonPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/mnt/local/spackdev/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.1.0/python-2.7.16-fcogqgw2cbvkftzmau6qse3ieezz2tel/bin/python2.7' '-s' 'setup.py' '--no-user-cfg' 'install' '--prefix=/mnt/local/spackdev/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-9.1.0/py-configobj-5.0.6-nlskpzrlxyv2doxvzmxdwn2ixp35yn7j' '--single-version-externally-managed' '--root=/'

1 error found in build log:
     15      warnings.warn(msg)
     16    usage: setup.py [global_opts] cmd1 [cmd1_opts] [cmd2 [cmd2_opts] ...
           ]
     17       or: setup.py --help [cmd1 cmd2 ...]
     18       or: setup.py --help-commands
     19       or: setup.py cmd --help
     20    
  >> 21    error: option --single-version-externally-managed not recognized

See build log for details:
  /cache/spack-stage/sbulut/py-configobj-5.0.6-nlskpzrlxyv2doxvzmxdwn2ixp35yn7j/spack-build-out.txt
```
title: Package/py configobj
